title: Restricted van der Waerden theorem for nilprogressions
abstract:
In [Adv. Math., 321 (2017) 269-286], using the theory of ultrafilters, J. H.
Johnson Jr., and F. K. Richter proved the nilpotent polynomial Hales-Jewett
theorem. Using this result they proved the restricted version of the van der
Waerden theorem for nilprogressions of rank $2$ and conjectured that this
result must hold for arbitrary rank. In this article, we give an affirmative
answer to their conjecture.
